subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Luge Racing
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: A great divide exists between countries like Germany and Argentina in sliding sports — in the standings as well as in financing, coaching and gaining access to the world’s 16 courses.
snippet: A great divide exists between countries like Germany and Argentina in sliding sports — in the standings as well as in financing, coaching and gaining access to the world’s 16 courses.
